attributes.review: Took FOREVER !! to download and i have perfectly good wifi at home. So then i decided to try to download on my ipad but it gave it a VIRUS. Finally got it work but only with a vpn. Tragic. Terrible app, i don’t recommend. literally don’t download it.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review: This app was the hardest thing to navigate, no explanations, and very hard to find anything. Plus the “news” I saw was I’m pretty sure what people call fake news, nothing seemed to make sense
attributes.title: Awful app 🤮

attributes.review: HUGE problems with this app. Not only does it bug out and give your viruses that posses your phone, it also does not work at all. The app is so horrid I still don’t understand how it’s still on the App Store. SERIOUSLY DONT DOWNLOAD!!! Completely trash app.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: This app took 5 hours to download and when it finally did all I see is Trump stuff I don’t understand why there are so many ads no I don’t want to go to your rally you old geezer
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Terrible app. I downloaded so while I could walk my carpet, I could watch the Tulsa rally. Sad I couldn’t make it. That’s besides the point, instead I got messages saying how amazing a orange is. 😡😡😡 10/10 Don’t recommend.

I downloaded this app to support our racist orange 🍊president 🖕🖕but when I opened it  my grandma👵🏾 fell to the floor and had a stroke 💀💀resulting in my house🏡 burning down🔥🔥🔥and our dog 🐶 becoming deaf 🔇i would appreciate it if you fixed the app thanksssss 🥰🥰
attributes.title: broken app

attributes.review: This app took 5 days to download! I was looking forward to knowing all about how I can support our racist president✨🤡but now I’ve realized the app is just as slow as he is😘✨🤗

attributes.review: We will not support the behavior of Donald Trump, a white supremacist on stolen land. Our country was created to escape the tyranny of our homelands and to have a better future four our kin. America is evolving backwards. Happy late Pride month, All countries matter
